original_text: From the blue and purple and scarlet yarns they made finely woven garments, for ministering in the Holy Place. They made the holy garments for Aaron, as the Lord had commanded Moses.
korean_text: 그들은 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 청색 자색 홍색 실로 성소에서 섬길 때 입을 정교한 옷을 만들고 또 아론을 위해 거룩한 옷을 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: From the blue and purple and scarlet yarns
for ministering in the Holy Place
They made the holy garments for Aaron
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아론을 위한 거룩한 옷을 만들었으니

sentences.original_text: as the Lord had commanded Moses
